channel.title: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
channel.description:
Now, i didn't ever saw a server where u don't get all skill levels 99 in 2 minutes or in an second typing in pure. I didn't saw a server where u don't get 200 mill when type starter. Now, this is my idea:
I want to make it like the real RuneScape. My idea is that u just get 10 exp each time u hit, and not 750, so like the real RuneScape. And that u need to train like the real RuneScape, and that u need to earn your money by drops and selling to shops. And i want to give like items you can eat or when u use a like knife on it, it will do something like the real rs. Like when u use a knife on a watermelon, u get 6 slices of it.
Now, isn't that a good idea?

item.title: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:5, topic:329772”]It has been tried before, but as far as I know, noone has ever completely succeeded.
It will take MONTHS and MONTHS of programming to get everything completely like RS. You can probably get the basics right (basic skills etc), but not everything. It’s just too much work, even for a java pro.[/quote]

*Years.

Read full topic

in other words, 12 year olds play rsps because they failed at runescape, therefore want the easy way out. riiight??

oh and… i’ve seen a few servers like this with about 80-120 players online… and that was just when they had first started.

item.title: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

I didn’t mean with this topic that i will do EVERYTHING, like all the minigames etc. Just things like that u level slow, items work right, skills will go right (but i don’t think i will succeed in farming with my current experience with java) and maybe other things too.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?

item.title: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

It has been tried before, but as far as I know, noone has ever completely succeeded.
It will take MONTHS and MONTHS of programming to get everything completely like RS. You can probably get the basics right (basic skills etc), but not everything. It’s just too much work, even for a java pro.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?

item.title: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

that’s the basis of lots of economy servers but you’ll have to work LOADS on your server before you attempt it and you’ll also need a few donations for a vps too. and if you like you can make it so you start out with 500 gp and all the necessary equipment for you to begin like the old RS. oh and for the items that will take at least 1 month to document all the items in runescape and how they work. you’ll need the help of lot’s of friends too. you’ll probably want to add all the minigames in rs too… or at least the most played. like bounty hunter, pset control, assault etc etc good luck with the amount of work required on this, and yeah i think it really is a good idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you like this idea or do you not like this idea?
